amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that any rules made under the "Frank R. Lautenberg Chemical Safety for the 21st Century Act" are exempted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 235 (Roll no. 42).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 235 (Roll no. 42).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Tonko.
